title: PROJECT Yi need some VO love
body:
So I absolutely love the PROJECT Yi skin. It's absolutely fantastic, from the particle effects to the animations to the voice work. However, I just have one slight suggestion for the skin: increase the frequency at which Yi says his VO lines while in Highlander.

I've heard the VO on the LoL Wikia and it's really great, not to mention being one of the main draws for the skin. However, since Yi spends so little time in his ult, you're lucky if you hear him say even one line. Lowering the VO cooldown for when Yi's in Highlander would be a cool addition for the skin that actually lets players appreciate the second voiceover. 

Thoughts?

replies.body:
Hiya Helmight,

I talked to the audio bro who worked on PROJECT: Yi and the frequency of those VO lines playing when he's in Highlander is already set to 100%, so we're unable to increase it. This is a difficult one because you're not in Highlander for too long of a time. :c

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=wV3EhLyw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-13T18:30:29.301+0000)
>
> Hiya Helmight,
> 
> I talked to the audio bro who worked on PROJECT: Yi and the frequency of those VO lines playing when he's in Highlander is already set to 100%, so we're unable to increase it. This is a difficult one because you're not in Highlander for too long of a time. :c

Wait.......there's a maximum???
Sure is! When you're buying items, for example, if your champion has item buying VO, it may only be set to 40% of the time so it doesn't get annoying. :P

I always wondered why they WOULDN'T say their buying lines 100% of the time.

That's honestly part of the reason I picked up Sion last season.

If I get your attention, can I also ask why, when champions get skins with new voiceovers (like Aether Wing Kayle) that the base champion doesn't get...something, to give them more then ~15-20 lines? Or in that case, were they different voice actors?
A lot of the time it's actually a different voice actor, so we aren't able to create new lines. For example, the VO actor for PROJECT: Yi is different from the base.
Ah, gotcha. Makes sense tbh, Highlander isn't that long of a duration and for most of it you're either Alpha Striking or dying. Thanks for the clarification though, Katey :D
